Text: Re The Manifesto Cc You have done a great job in putting this together and I would like to endorse it I have only two concerns that have been noted by others First as Mitch Wilk pointed out the utilities were not required to sell their power plants but they were encouraged to do so Second I agree with Bill Hogan that the last paragraph of the Summary takes an unnecessary swipe at the Governor You may want to end the summary in the same tone you ended the manifesto Phillip

Re The Manifesto Cc You have done a great job in putting this together and I would like to endorse it I have only two concerns that have been noted by others First as Mitch Wilk pointed out the utilities were not required to sell their power plants but they were encouraged to do so Second I agree with Bill Hogan that the last paragraph of the Summary takes an unnecessary swipe at the Governor You may want to end the summary in the same tone you ended the manifesto Phillip
